messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Language resources
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/13/2002 11:54:24 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Spanish Numbers This site
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/13/2002 11:54:24 PM Eastern Standard Time,
cen46624@... writes:


>
> Hi!
>
> My kids and I have decided to learn German or Spanish and are looking
> for on-line resources. It seemed to me like someone on this list had
> recommended something wonderful several months ago, when I wasn't
> interested. If it was you, or if you know of something wonderful, please
> let me know.
>

<A HREF="http://www.jvlnet.com/~liliana/Spanish_Numbers.html">Spanish Numbers</A>
This site was really cool...it's virtual flashcards that allow you to click
on the item being shown and you hear the Spanish word for it. Be
patient...loads slowly.
Amy Kagey

messages.subject: Language resources
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! My kids and I have decided to learn German or Spanish and are looking for on-line resources. It seemed to me like someone on this list had recommended
messages.messageBody:
Hi!

My kids and I have decided to learn German or Spanish and are looking
for on-line resources. It seemed to me like someone on this list had
recommended something wonderful several months ago, when I wasn't
interested. If it was you, or if you know of something wonderful, please
let me know.

Thanks!

:-) Diane
